attributes.action: Stop paying tv licence until Jeremy clarkson is re enstated on top gear
attributes.additional_details: All the money we pay for a tv licence goes to the BBC as they cannot broadcast descent enough programs to sustain themselves. The only one descent program they did have is top gear and with the sacking of Jeremy clarkson top gear is not worth watching, so I find my self asking why am I paying for a licence to watch BBC channels when there's nothing good on the? We need to stop paying to licence until Jeremy clarkson is re enstated.

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC to answer.
